group_1.textRight: Kako!

group_1.textLeft: Ayame[chara:301101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]!
And...[chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hazuki?
Huh? Didn't ya say it was gonna be one@person, Kako?

group_1.textRight: Hello there! I just happened to run into@Ayame earlier.
Uh, y-yeah, yeah... Just ran into her.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, but we...

group_1.textRight: You don't have to worry 'bout Konoha!@Right, Hazuki?
So you've already told her that much.@[chara:302701:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:302701:cheek_0]Yeah, it's nothing to worry about.

group_1.textLeft: O-oh, okay...

group_1.textRight: Anyway, who might you be? We didn't@meet last time, did we?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, I brought her to introduce her to Ayame!
We're all the same age, so...
The name's Felicia Mitsuki! What's up?

group_1.textRight: This the girl you were talkin' about, Kako?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, this is her!
Felicia's also a Magical Girl. She does@mercenary work!

group_1.textRight: Mercenary? As in, people you hire to fight@for you?

group_1.textLeft: Yup! Don't matter if you run into a super@tough Witch! You'll be fine with me around!
Right, Kako?
Yes, she's really strong!

group_1.textRight: ([chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Hmmm...)
I-I'm super strong too, ya know!

group_1.textLeft: Oh yeah? So you're the one Kako was@talking about.
Oh, dear me, I didn't introduce her!@This is Ayame Mikuri!

group_1.textRight: Hehe!
Oh, and I'm Hazuki Yusa. I guess you could@say I'm Ayame's, uh...guardian?

group_1.textLeft: Guardian? You can't be that strong if you've@got one of those!

group_1.textRight: Hey, hey, hey! [chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger] She's NOT my guardian!
Oh, sorry, sorry. Um, then I guess we're@more like friends?
See, see?! I'm strong!

group_1.textLeft: Just because she's not your guardian @doesn't mean you're strong!

group_1.textRight: But I AM strong! Right, Hazuki?
Well, I might be a little biased, but yes,@I think you're very strong.
See! See!

group_1.textLeft: Hmmph! Whatevs!
A-Ayame! And you too, Felicia!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, come on, everyone. Let's calm down.@We can talk all that through later, okay?
Mmngh[chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]!

group_1.textLeft: Hngh[chara:100501:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]!
Oh,[chara:301101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] I-I brought some snacks from my house!
D-do you want to try some?

group_1.textRight: Heck yeah, I do[chara:302801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]!

group_1.textLeft: Me too[chara:100501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]!
I'm glad! Um, Hazuki, please have some, too!

group_1.textRight: What,[chara:302701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy] really? Aw, you're too kind.
I'll take...

group_1.textLeft: ...this one!

group_1.textCenter: (Heh... That Felicia girl's a bit weird.)
(But, I'm definitely way stronger than her!)
(Is it still really okay, not tellin'@Konoha?)

group_1.textLeft: Is it still really okay, not tellin' Konoha?

group_1.textRight: It should be fine. For right now, at least.
Otherwise we wouldn't be able to surprise@her, now, would we?

group_1.textLeft: Yeeeah, but...!

group_1.textRight: Ayame. Konoha and I really trust your@instincts, you know.

group_1.textLeft: My instincts?

group_1.textRight: So follow your heart. Just go with your@gut feeling, 'kay?
I'm sure if you just follow your heart,@everything will turn out just fine!

group_1.textLeft: Okay...
(Hangin' out with Kako and Felicia's@really fun.)
(I don't get any bad vibes from 'em.)

group_1.textRight: Ayame...

group_1.textLeft: (I wanna spend more time with 'em...)

group_1.textRight: Ayame.

group_1.textLeft: (But Konoha told me not to trust anyone...)
(We gotta make it just the three of us...)

group_1.textRight: Ayame!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Hwagh!

group_1.textRight: What's the matter? You were staring off@into space...
What were you thinking about?

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Um, I was just...
I was just wonderin' if dinner's ready!

group_1.textRight: Then go and help Hazuki. She's been calling@you for a while now.

group_1.textCenter: Come on, Ayame! Come help me set the@table!

group_1.textLeft: A-ah, 'kay! Comin'!

group_1.narration: I really wanna keep spendin' time@with Kako and Felicia.
I wanna hang out with 'em lots more.
